comment.author: SsTils
comment.body:
Bit of misinformation regarding xst/sgc
- Hasnt started drilling yet. Should be this week.
- the independent resource assessment doesnt necessarily require drill data. It can be based off 2d and 3d seismic data etc and therefore could potentially be any day now. At the same time they could wait til post drill to refine it.
- it wont be a 30 day wait after the spud before more announcements. Data and results roll in as the drill proceeds. The managing directors have in the past updated shareholders as they went.
Edit: and for fucks sake its drilling for gas. Not oil.

Gotta hand it to BD1. As the shine was starting to come off the ovarian cancer detection announcement and people were starting to ask questions (why does nobody in the scientific community seem to care 3 days later about this "game changing breakthrough"? why was the original research paper this was based on in 2018 widely overlooked and only had 2 citations? where is more data about the latest trial?) and wonder if the market overreacted, they come out with another blockbuster sounding announcement sending the stock price soaring again.

One thing is for sure, they've definitely proven they are good at creating hype, so i would not count anything out in the short term.

comment.author: SAIUN666
comment.body:
Big welcome to all the new members of the RAC city gang in the last couple of weeks.
Reminder that after big price surges like the one we saw recently, there's usually a pullback. Don't panic and sell, it's normal and expected. Just keep holding for that sweet CGT discount.
In case you need some crayons:
[Strong price surges tend to pull back to the 38.2% Fibonacci retracement level.](https://i.imgur.com/xOmfxy8.png) Should this happen again, we'll settle at around $2.44 **THIS IS THE DIP THAT YOU BUY IF YOU WANT MORE**
Why did I use a log-scale for the chart? Because [that's the most exciting one.](https://i.imgur.com/zvSqGOp.jpg) For a continuous 19 months now, RAC has remained in an overall uptrend within this rising channel on the log chart. That's *exponential* growth. This is the market re-rating RAC to a higher value.
But as you all hopefully know, nothing goes up in a straight line. Every stock has some short term traders, day traders, bots doing high-frequency algo trades and whatever. You don't get a straight line up but you do get upwards movement within a channel, with some pull backs along the way.
Share price almost doubled in a week, there most likely will be a pull back. But unless fundamentals change, the price will continue up long term. Don't jump in and out, just hold and buy more so the tax man doesn't steal your gains.
